entities.description: A unique identifier for an offender.
Frequency count of responses without weighting.
Specific categories of responses such as 'N offenders unknown'.
Statistical measure, such as mean, median, mode, etc.
Information regarding cases with missing data.

relationships.description: Indicates the frequency count of responses for a given offender number.
Relates an offender number to a specific response category.
Provides statistical measures for the various response categories.
Indicates that some data for a given offender number is missing.
